data.title: 活动平台
data.content:
Activity platform:

All members worldwide

 

Activities:

Points for prizes! Good gifts can't be finished! !

The game is running water, and the accumulated points can be exchanged for commodities, allowing you to have fun and get gifts.

 

Application method:

Go to the Global International [Points Mall], select redeem goods> press to redeem now> fill in the recipient information, and submit it to complete the application.

 

Activity Rules:

  1. After completing the redemption, we will manually review the order (ex. members record whether there is any abnormality, the product is not out of stock), after confirming that it will be shipped, the waiting time is about 7 working days.
  2. There will be no points for fishing and Kaiyuan chess.
  3. The bonus points redeemed from the mall points must be doubled, and no game fishing or Kaiyuan chess cards are allowed.
  4. If you have special delivery requirements, you can specify in the remarks, or contact online customer service before shipment.
  5. When signing for express delivery, please unpack in front of the courier and confirm that the goods are correct. If you have any questions, please do not receive the goods and notify Easy Gaming online customer service. We will do our best to handle it for you.
  6. The products exchanged by Easy Gaming are delivered directly by the merchant. If you cannot confirm the product in the first time, it may cause damage to your rights.
  7. Easy Gaming reserves all rights to change, stop and cancel the promotion activities at any time, and has the final interpretation right for this activity.
  8. The date for calculating the points is from 12:00 noon every Monday to 11:59 noon next Monday, and the new points will be distributed after 12 noon every Monday.
  9. Points are reserved until 23:59 on December 31, Beijing time.
